snippet: Security forces fired rubber bullets and tear gas at stone-wielding protesters Kampala on Monday as an activist group tried to reignite street demonstrations.
lead_paragraph: Security forces fired rubber bullets and tear gas at stone-wielding protesters Kampala on Monday as an activist group tried to reignite street demonstrations.

headline.main: Uganda: Security Forces Clash With Protesters
headline.seo: In Uganda, Security Forces Clash With Protesters
